Relate Back.definition: to apply or take effect retroactively esp. based on relation back [the amendment relates back to the date of the original pleading " Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 15
Relate Back.origin: [the amendment relates back to the date of the original pleading " Federal Rules of Civil Procedure Rule 15(c)"]

re·lat·ing back.definition: to apply or take effect retroactively esp. based on relation back [the amendmentto the date of the original pleading "Rule 15(c)"]
